label: On 30 November 1993 Israel President Ezer Weizman held a reception at his residence in Jerusalem for the county's newly elected mayors and the new heads of municipal authorities of the biggest towns of Israel: Jerusalem - Ehud Olmert, Tel Aviv - Roni Milo and haifa - Amram Mitzna".
